content: stimulate baby s senses with this cheerful little crochet blanket created using red heart super saver super craft kit you ll work from side to side using the entrelac technique with the tunisian simple stitch working squares that are picked up and joined as you go side-to-side stitchwork creates stunning vertical stripes with a saw-tooth edge flouncy tassels add a touch of whimsy to complete the look materials red heart® super saver® super craft kit™ kit includes 12 balls 50 g/1 7 oz each 600 g/21 oz total yardage 85 m/93 yds each 1020 m/1116 yds total measurements approx 31 x 32½ 78 5 cm x 82 5 cm excluding tassels
